duties_responsibilities.duty: Contribute to creating a customer-centric environment and support the store leadership team in service, selling, and daily processes.
Act as an expert in the operating procedures and contribute to the mentorship of the associate team.
Collaborate with the leadership team to cultivate an environment of genuine customer connection and drive sales using key performance indicators.
Utilize technology to deliver a seamless, omni-channel shopping experience through execution of all omni services.
Participate in managing the store environment and customer experience, including facilitating an energized pace, positivity of the team, and management of daily zones.
Support daily operating processes such as opening and closing procedures, maintaining store standards, restocking product, and helping with facilities or IT issues.
Contribute to an inclusive work environment by actively listening to others and seeking different perspectives.
